title: Mike Musto
description:
Mike Musto is the host of 'The House of Muscle", a former host of /DRIVE, and lover of all classic automobiles. He has a cool, eclectic collection of cars, from a Wagoneer to a '68 Dodge Charger to a Porsche 928S. He joins us to talk about his Porsche, the crazy prices of new cars, the joys of owner older metal, and Rad Wood. https://www.youtube.com/thehouseofmuscle

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/tst

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/ouP4L47V7wE

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @MDMusto

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @mike_musto
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
